definition: To make adjustments or changes to something, typically to rectify errors, mistakes, or inaccuracies. It is commonly employed when reviewing and improving written texts, assignments, or documents.

examples.english: I have to correct my work.

examples.german: Kannst du bitte meinen Aufsatz korrigieren?
examples.english: Can you please correct my essay?

examples.german: Der Lehrer korrigierte die Fehler in den Tests.
examples.english: The teacher corrected the mistakes in the tests.

examples.german: Sie korrigierte ihre Aussprache, um besser zu klingen.
examples.english: She corrected her pronunciation to sound better.

examples.german: Die Redakteurin korrigierte die Grammatikfehler im Artikel.
examples.english: The editor corrected the grammar mistakes in the article.
